products.title: Turin 25mm Primary Yellow Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Introduce bright sunshine feels within your space with their rainbow 25mm yellow perfect fit aluminium venetian blind. This funky yellow shade is perfect for adding a splash of colour to the interiors of your home or office. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it fits straight onto upvc frames with no need for screws or drills. Product id: db-dpfven0380 fabric colour: primary yellow s25010 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Metis Solar Yellow Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Metis solar pleated fabric is available in a wide range of colours and features a silver solar speckled backing. Fantastic for conservatories, hot rooms like offices or even rooms with south-facing windows. This bright yellow blind would look at home in any kitchen or conservatory, pair with trending shades in this seasons blues and greens for a talking point. Product id: db-nfpl0014 fabric colour: yellow material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Metallic 25mm Rose Gold T7345 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: Their metallic venetians add a a natural flare to your home. In several metal-like hues, these blinds would look great in modern or rustic settings. Rose gold is a shade that continues to dominate the decor, clothing and accessories markets. A trending colour for several years and a great, softer alternative to copper. This blind would look great with some lush green plants to enhance your window.
